event: As of November 2023, Charles Koch was ranked as the 22nd richest man in the world on the Bloomberg Billionaires Index, with an estimated net worth of $60 billion.
Name: Charles Koch

event: Charles Koch has been co-owner, chairman, and chief executive officer of Koch Industries since 1967, while his late brother David Koch served as executive vice president.
Name: Charles Koch

event: Charles Koch has published four books detailing Charles Koch's business philosophy, The Science of Success (2007), Market Based Management, Good Profit (2015), and Believe in People (2020).
Name: Charles Koch

event: Charles Koch received a Bachelor of Science (B.S.) in General Engineering in 1957, a Master of Science (M.S.) in Nuclear Engineering in 1958, and a second M.S. in Chemical Engineering in 1959.
Name: Charles Koch

event: In 2008, Charles Koch was included in Businessweek's list of top 50 American givers.
Name: Charles Koch

event: In 2022, Charles Koch was named one of the US' top 'climate villains' by The Guardian.
Name: Charles Koch

event: Charles Koch supported his brother's candidacy for vice president on the Libertarian Party ticket in 1980.
Name: Charles Koch

event: In 2011, Charles Koch was awarded the William E. Simon Prize for Philanthropic Leadership.
